mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_OUT_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_OUT_FL = 'Y' AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_OUT_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND CURRENT_DATE - ENROLL_DATE = 0

SELECT GROUP_NO, GROUP_NAME, TO_CHAR(GROUP_DATE, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') "GROUP_DATE", (SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM "MEMBER" M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = G.MEMBER_NO) AS "MEMBER_NICKNAME", G.MEMBER_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_GROUP MG JOIN "MEMBER" M2 ON (MG.MEMBER_NO = M2.MEMBER_NO) WHERE MG.GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO AND MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_GROUP_BAN = 'N' AND M2.MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND M2.MEMBER_OUT_FL = 'N') AS MEMBER_COUNT, GROUP_MAX_POPULATION, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHEDULE S WHERE S.GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) AS ACTIVE_COUNT FROM "GROUP" G WHERE GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY ACTIVE_COUNT DESC
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') "ENROLL_DATE", MEMBER_DEL_FL FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_OUT_FL = 'N' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT R.MEMBER_NO FROM REPORT R JOIN "MEMBER" M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL =#{memberEmail}
SELECT R.MEMBER_NO, REPORT_NO, REPORT_DETAIL,REPORT_DATE, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, REPORT_VIEW FROM REPORT R JOIN "MEMBER" M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO)
